content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am confused about what can I do after I graduate.
I' m sorry to hear that. I' ve always been a bit confused about what to do. What is the worst thing you can do to get your mind off of this situation?
Maybe keep addicted to academic research.
That is a good place to start! You can also do your schoolwork online. I know you can take advantage of some of the free time that you have accrued during this period.
